translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph."
"Yes, teacher, a question."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は父様に抱かれなくていいの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it okay if I don't get embraced by Father?"
"Yes, of course."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根ちゃんがそういうことをするのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane-chan, when you do something like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根ちゃんが本当に好きな人とだけにしよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's reserve it only for the person you truly love."
"...Thank you, Fukane-chan."
"Mm, understood."
"Then, I'll do my best in the battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦会議が終わる頃には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time the strategy meeting ended,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 丁度皆の食事も終わっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everyone had just finished their meal.
"Alright then—"
"Let's all put our hands together."
"It's about time to go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへ、お父さんに会いに、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe, to go meet dad, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれー？　杖、杖、お婆ちゃんの杖どこ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? The staff, the staff, where’s grandma’s staff..."
"Sushinu, over here!"
"Big sister, do you have a sexual disease?"
"Just to be sure, yes."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしっ、チューリップの点検終わり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, inspection of the tulip is finished."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今更だけど、本当に来るのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s late to ask now, but are you really coming?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、私じゃ足手まといってこと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, does that mean I’m a burden?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、そーゆー意味じゃなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it’s not that kind of meaning..."
"Hehe.
We’ll be together forever."
"...I understand.
I won’t stop you anymore."
"Mmm, I’m ready here too."
"Though it’s late to say now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にヌークも来るのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you really going to come too, Nuke?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は来なくてもいいんだぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You don’t have to come, you know?"
"Tch!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別にあんたの為に行くわけじゃないわよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not like I’m going because of you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の子達は私にとっても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The children of the Demon King are already my friends,
so obviously I’m going with them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に行くに決まってるじゃない！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I get it.
I won’t stop you anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食事を終えたあなた達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After finishing their meal, you all

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各々がそれぞれの戦闘の用意を進めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: each proceeded with preparing for battle.
"Hey kid, can I have a moment?
I need to discuss something with you..."
"Young lady, can I have a moment?
I need to ask you something..."
"Hey, Dark Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前さん、前の剣がなくなったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’ve lost your old sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 代わりの剣はあんのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do you have a replacement sword?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　一応、剣なら代わりを用意したぜ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Yes, I prepared a replacement sword just in case.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構奮発して買ったもんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I even splurged a bit to buy it..."
"Hmph, it’s dull."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞、儂はダークランスの剣となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Aile>, I shall be Dark Lance’s sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前さんには日光もあるしいいだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You also have sunlight, so it should be fine."
"...That’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞さんも不慣れな二刀流より、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Compared to <Aile>-san using an inexperienced dual-wielding style,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私だけを使った方がいいでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s better to just use me alone."
"That’s right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「強い武器が貸してもらえんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I can borrow a powerful weapon,
that’s exactly what I want, too."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph."
"Yes, teacher, a question."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は父様に抱かれなくていいの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is it okay if I don't get embraced by Father?"
"Yes, of course."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「深根ちゃんがそういうことをするのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fukane-chan, when you do something like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深根ちゃんが本当に好きな人とだけにしよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's reserve it only for the person you truly love."
"...Thank you, Fukane-chan."
"Mm, understood."
"Then, I'll do my best in the battle."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: everyone had just finished their meal.
"Alright then—"
"Let's all put our hands together."
"It's about time to go."

"...I understand.

"Though it’s late to say now...

so obviously I’m going with them!

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I get it.
I won’t stop you anymore."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: each proceeded with preparing for battle.
"Hey kid, can I have a moment?

"Young lady, can I have a moment?
I need to ask you something..."
"Hey, Dark Lance.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’ve lost your old sword,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do you have a replacement sword?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　一応、剣なら代わりを用意したぜ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? Yes, I prepared a replacement sword just in case.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結構奮発して買ったもんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I even splurged a bit to buy it..."
"Hmph, it’s dull."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞、儂はダークランスの剣となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Aile>, I shall be Dark Lance’s sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前さんには日光もあるしいいだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You also have sunlight, so it should be fine."
"...That’s right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞さんも不慣れな二刀流より、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Compared to <Aile>-san using an inexperienced dual-wielding style,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私だけを使った方がいいでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s better to just use me alone."
"That’s right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「強い武器が貸してもらえんなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I can borrow a powerful weapon,
that’s exactly what I want, too."
